trans-unit.source: Complete minimum device setup
trans-unit.target: Complete minimum device setup

trans-unit.source: Describes how to complete the minimum StorSimple device configuration.
trans-unit.target: Describes how to complete the minimum StorSimple device configuration.

trans-unit.source: To complete the minimum StorSimple device setup
trans-unit.target: To complete the minimum StorSimple device setup

trans-unit.source: Select the device and click **Quick Start**.
trans-unit.target: Select the device and click **Quick Start**.

trans-unit.source: Click **Complete device setup** to start the Configure device wizard.
trans-unit.target: Click **Complete device setup** to start the Configure device wizard.

trans-unit.source: In the Configure device wizard **Basic Settings** dialog box, do the following:
trans-unit.target: In the Configure device wizard **Basic Settings** dialog box, do the following:

trans-unit.source: Supply a **friendly name** for your device.
trans-unit.target: Supply a **friendly name** for your device.

trans-unit.source: The default device name reflects information such as the device model and serial number.
trans-unit.target: The default device name reflects information such as the device model and serial number.

trans-unit.source: You can assign a friendly name of up to 64 characters to manage your device.
trans-unit.target: You can assign a friendly name of up to 64 characters to manage your device.

trans-unit.source: Set the **time zone** based on the geographic location in which the device is being deployed.
trans-unit.target: Set the **time zone** based on the geographic location in which the device is being deployed.

trans-unit.source: Your device will use this time zone for all scheduled operations.
trans-unit.target: Your device will use this time zone for all scheduled operations.

trans-unit.source: Under **DNS Settings**, provide an address for your **Secondary DNS Server**.
trans-unit.target: Under **DNS Settings**, provide an address for your **Secondary DNS Server**.

trans-unit.source: If you are using IPv6, the field will be populated based on the IPv6 prefix provided in the Windows PowerShell interface.
trans-unit.target: If you are using IPv6, the field will be populated based on the IPv6 prefix provided in the Windows PowerShell interface.

trans-unit.source: If the secondary DNS server is not configured, you will not be allowed to save your device configuration.
trans-unit.target: If the secondary DNS server is not configured, you will not be allowed to save your device configuration.

trans-unit.source: Under iSCSI enabled interfaces, enable at least one network for iSCSI.
trans-unit.target: Under iSCSI enabled interfaces, enable at least one network for iSCSI.

trans-unit.source: At least one network interface needs to be cloud-enabled and one interface needs to be iSCSI-enabled.
trans-unit.target: At least one network interface needs to be cloud-enabled and one interface needs to be iSCSI-enabled.

trans-unit.source: DATA 0 is automatically cloud-enabled.
trans-unit.target: DATA 0 is automatically cloud-enabled.

trans-unit.source: StorSimple minimum device setup basic settings
trans-unit.target: StorSimple minimum device setup basic settings

trans-unit.source: Click the arrow icon.
trans-unit.target: Click the arrow icon.

trans-unit.source: StorSimple arrow icon
trans-unit.target: StorSimple arrow icon

trans-unit.source: In the **Network Interfaces** dialog box, provide the fixed IP addresses for Controller 0 and Controller 1.
trans-unit.target: In the **Network Interfaces** dialog box, provide the fixed IP addresses for Controller 0 and Controller 1.

trans-unit.source: The controller fixed IP addresses need to be free IPs within the subnet accessible by the device IP address.
trans-unit.target: The controller fixed IP addresses need to be free IPs within the subnet accessible by the device IP address.

trans-unit.source: If the DATA 0 interface was configured for IPv4, the fixed IP addresses need to be provided in the IPv4 format.
trans-unit.target: If the DATA 0 interface was configured for IPv4, the fixed IP addresses need to be provided in the IPv4 format.

trans-unit.source: If you provided a prefix for IPv6 configuration, the fixed IP addresses will be populated automatically in these fields.
trans-unit.target: If you provided a prefix for IPv6 configuration, the fixed IP addresses will be populated automatically in these fields.

trans-unit.source: Click the check icon ![StorSimple check icon](./media/storsimple-complete-minimum-device-setup/HCS_CheckIcon-include.png).
trans-unit.target: Click the check icon ![StorSimple check icon](./media/storsimple-complete-minimum-device-setup/HCS_CheckIcon-include.png).

trans-unit.source: You will return to the device **Quick Start** page.
trans-unit.target: You will return to the device **Quick Start** page.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] You can modify all the other device settings at any time by accessing the **Configure** page.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] You can modify all the other device settings at any time by accessing the **Configure** page.
